nodes.text: The Unfyr were an ancient warrior culture of the Ka'hren species on V'shar.
The Unfyr warriors were adept in the use of the rantok traditional sword, and they worshiped a minor god of war and wisdom named Ni'Shaw.
The Unfyr people rejected the use of blasters as an alternative to the rantok, which was one of the reasons that led to their extinction.
After their fall, both their god and their weapon were forgotten until their rediscovery centuries later by Kaltor Naklian.
